title: Create Diagrams with D2
text: goal d2r support creation, reading, writing, rendering D2 diagrams using R. D2? D2 Introduction: D2 diagram scripting language turns text diagrams. stands Declarative Diagramming. Declarative, , describe want diagrammed, generates image. contributor D2 Extension Quarto created package experiment possibilities native R diagram creation rendering. Note package experimental process building editing D2 diagrams likely change. also hope add knitr engine support d2 code blocks within RMarkdown Quarto document.

title: Create Diagrams with D2
text: can install development version d2r like :
code: # pak::pkg_install("elipousson/d2r")

title: Create Diagrams with D2
text: d2 installed available PATH, can check version: D2 installed Homebrew, may trouble rendering diagram within RMarkdown. , may need set environmental variable points D2 PATH. Use d2_which() locate path installed version D2: See 2018 blog post Tony Tsai trouble-shooting PATH variable issues brew-installed commands.
code: library(d2r) d2_version() #> ℹ v0.6.7 <https://d2lang.com/releases/0.6.7> d2_which() #> [1] "/opt/homebrew/bin/d2"

title: Create Diagrams with D2
text: basic example using d2_diagram() create basic diagram two connected shapes based named character vector:  can pass named unnamed lines text D2 syntax, specify connectors (used named elements), set overall direction diagram:  entity-relationship diagrams table schema can represented using SQL table style diagrams d2_sql_table():  can use d2_render() convert D2 file PNG, SVG, PDF, GIF file. d2_include() wrapper knitr::include_graphics() helps include diagram Quarto R Markdown document:
code:
# Helper function for file paths fig_path <- \(x) {   paste0(knitr::opts_chunk$get("fig.path"), x) }  options("d2r.pad" = 20) options("d2r.direction" = "right") simple_diagram <- d2_diagram(   c("R" = "D2") )  simple_diagram #> [1] "direction: right" ""                 "R -> D2" d2_include(   simple_diagram,   fig_path("simple_diagram.png") ) connected_diagram <- d2_diagram(   c("R" = "D2", "D2" = "R"),   "R.shape: oval",   "D2.shape: square",   connector = "->" )  connected_diagram #> [1] "direction: right" ""                 "R -> D2"          "D2 -> R"          #> [5] "R.shape: oval"    "D2.shape: square" d2_include(   connected_diagram,   fig_path("connected_diagram.png") ) mtcars_tbl <- d2_sql_table(mtcars[, 1:4], id = "mtcars")  mtcars_tbl #> [1] "mtcars: {
       label: mtcars
     shape: sql_table
        mpg: dbl

    cyl: dbl

    disp: dbl

    hp: dbl

}"  d2_include(mtcars_tbl, output = fig_path("mtcars.png")) diagram <- d2_diagram(   c(     "Beginning" = "Middle",     "Middle" = "End",     "End" = "Beginning"   ),   "Beginning.shape: circle",   "End.shape: square",   direction = "right" )  diagram #> [1] "direction: right"        ""                        #> [3] "Beginning -> Middle"     "Middle -> End"           #> [5] "End -> Beginning"        "Beginning.shape: circle" #> [7] "End.shape: square"  d2_include(   diagram,   output = fig_path("include-example.png"),   sketch = TRUE,   theme = "Terminal" )

title: Create Diagrams with D2
text: Quarto extension embedding d2 diagrams documents: quarto-d2 ggplot2 packages building diagrams network visualizations: ggdiagram ggflowchart ggraph ggdag network visualization packages: DiagrammeR networkD3 packages working diagrams: minixcali Find diagram-focused packages projects GitHub list.

title: Basic D2 utilities — d2-utils
text: Basic D2 utilities d2_which(): List path D2 d2_version(): List installed version D2 d2_themes(): List available D2 themes d2_layout(): Lists available layout engine options short help

title: Basic D2 utilities — d2-utils
code: d2_which()  d2_version()  d2_themes()  d2_layout(layout = NULL)

title: Basic D2 utilities — d2-utils
text: layout Layout name. supplied, display long help particular layout engine, including configuration options.

what: Specify attributes for a single arrowhead or a pair of source and target arrowheads — d2_arrowhead
title: Specify attributes for a single arrowhead or a pair of source and target arrowheads — d2_arrowhead
text: d2_arrowhead() specifies label, shape, fill source target arrowhead. d2_arrowheads() allows specification source target arrowhead.

title: Specify attributes for a single arrowhead or a pair of source and target arrowheads — d2_arrowhead
code: d2_arrowhead(   shape = "triangle",   type = c("target", "source"),   label = NULL,   filled = NULL )  d2_arrowheads(..., target = list(), source = list(), id = NULL)

title: Specify attributes for a single arrowhead or a pair of source and target arrowheads — d2_arrowhead
text: shape See keys_d2[["arrowhead"]] allowed shape values. type Type arrowhead: "target" "source". label Short arrowhead label. filled Must NULL logical. Ignored shape "arrow" crow's foot shape (shape starting "cf-"). ... Named parameters used set values source target arrowheads. target, source Named list arguments (excluding type) passed d2_arrowhead(). id D2 diagram map identifier. container map attributes recycled match length id using vctrs::vec_recycle_common()

title: Specify attributes for a single arrowhead or a pair of source and target arrowheads — d2_arrowhead

what: Create a D2 container or map — d2_container
title: Create a D2 container or map — d2_container
text: container map group diagram elements. special chart types, SQL Table created d2_sql_table() must set container. Using containers can also help set element properties including class, label, shape dimensions (width height) set diagram elements.

title: Create a D2 container or map — d2_container
code: d2_container(   ...,   lines = NULL,   id = NULL,   class = NULL,   name = NULL,   label = NULL,   shape = NULL,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   icon = NULL,   style = d2_style(),   collapse = NULL )

title: Create a D2 container or map — d2_container
text: ... Diagram text. lines Optional diagram text. supplied lines recycled match length id. id D2 diagram map identifier. container map attributes recycled match length id using vctrs::vec_recycle_common() class Diagram class name Diagram container name label Diagram label shape Diagram shape width, height Diagram width height (pixels?) icon Diagram icon style string results d2_style() helper function. collapse collapse = "\n", return string D2 diagram code container. collapse = NULL (default), return character vector length id.

title: Create a D2 container or map — d2_container
text: string character vector D2 diagram code.

title: Create a D2 container or map — d2_container

what: Create a D2 diagram from a named vector and connectors — d2_diagram
title: Create a D2 diagram from a named vector and connectors — d2_diagram
text: Note: initial experimental implementation diagram building may change deprecated future.

title: Create a D2 diagram from a named vector and connectors — d2_diagram
code: d2_diagram(   lines = NULL,   ...,   connector = NULL,   id = NULL,   direction = getOption("d2r.direction"),   import = NULL,   collapse = NULL )

title: Create a D2 diagram from a named vector and connectors — d2_diagram
text: lines list character vector. Named elements connected using supplied connector value. Unnamed elements kept assumed valid D2 code. ... Additional elements diagram included initial lines. connector Default NULL uses "->" connect name shape value shape. Must vector : –, ->, <-, <->. Vector recycled match length named shapes. id Identifier map container diagram. direction Optional direction diagram. Must one : , , right, left. import File name names append import top diagram. named, standard import method using name import name imported element. import unnamed, partial import method used: https://d2lang.com/tour/imports#partial-imports See: https://d2lang.com/tour/imports collapse optional character string separate results.      NA_character_.  collapse string,     result always string (character length 1).

title: Create a D2 diagram from a named vector and connectors — d2_diagram
code: d2_diagram(c("x" = "y")) #> [1] "x -> y"  d2_diagram(c("a" = "b"), connector = "<-", direction = "up") #> [1] "direction: up" ""              "a <- b"         d2_diagram(c("start" = "end"), connector = "<->", import = "imported.d2") #> [1] "...@imported.d2" ""                "start <-> end"

what: Plot a D2 diagram as a ggplot2 using magick::image_ggplot() — d2_ggplot
title: Plot a D2 diagram as a ggplot2 using magick::image_ggplot() — d2_ggplot
text: d2_ggplot() renders D2 diagram input character vector file path (diagram file rendered diagram) plots image magick::image_ggplot().

title: Plot a D2 diagram as a ggplot2 using magick::image_ggplot() — d2_ggplot
code: d2_ggplot(   x,   ...,   density = 150,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   interpolate = FALSE,   arg = caller_arg(x),   call = caller_env() )

title: Plot a D2 diagram as a ggplot2 using magick::image_ggplot() — d2_ggplot
text: x character vector diagram text file path D2 diagram file render diagram d2_render() plotting. file path rendered D2 diagram file one using svg, pdf, png, gif file extension also allowed. ... Additional parameters passed d2_diagram(). density Resolution render pdf passed magick::image_read_pdf(). Default 150. width pixels height pixels interpolate passed ggplot2::annotation_raster arg argument name string. argument mentioned error messages input origin problem. call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

what: Install D2 using the sh script — d2_install
title: Install D2 using the sh script — d2_install
text: d2_install() downloads executes sh script provided installing D2 Getting Started documentation. secure way install D2. consider using Homebrew, pre-built Windows installer, another installation option listed detailed installation instructions.

title: Install D2 using the sh script — d2_install
code: d2_install(dry_run = TRUE)

title: Install D2 using the sh script — d2_install
text: dry_run TRUE (default), append "--dry-run" arguments passed sh command.

what: Read, write, and format D2 files — d2_read
title: Read, write, and format D2 files — d2_read
text: Read, write, format D2 files

title: Read, write, and format D2 files — d2_read
code: d2_read(file)  d2_write(data, file = NULL, fileext = "d2", tidy = getOption("d2r.tidy", TRUE))  d2_fmt(file)

title: Read, write, and format D2 files — d2_read
text: file File name write disk. NULL, set temporary file name using supplied file extension. data set lines file path d2 file. fileext File extension use writing data disk. tidy TRUE, pass tidy flag command line execution. Defaults getOption("d2r.tidy", TRUE).

what: Render a D2 input file to an output file — d2_render
title: Render a D2 input file to an output file — d2_render
text: Render D2 input file output file d2_include() combines d2_render() knitr::include_graphics().

title: Render a D2 input file to an output file — d2_render
code: d2_render(   input,   output = NULL,   ...,   fileext = "svg",   layout = getOption("d2r.layout", "elk"),   theme = getOption("d2r.theme"),   sketch = getOption("d2r.sketch"),   pad = getOption("d2r.pad"),   animate_interval = NULL,   font_family = NULL,   overwrite = TRUE,   preview = FALSE,   call = caller_env() )  d2_include(   input,   output = NULL,   ...,   auto_pdf = getOption("knitr.graphics.auto_pdf", FALSE),   dpi = NULL,   rel_path = getOption("knitr.graphics.rel_path", TRUE),   error = getOption("knitr.graphics.error", TRUE) )

title: Render a D2 input file to an output file — d2_render
text: input Required input file "d2" file extension. output Output filename. ... Additional input flags. Optional character vector. fileext One : svg, pdf, png, gif, pptx. Ignored output supplied. layout Layout. One : elk, dagre, taga theme Diagram theme name code. Theme names case sensitive. Use d2_themes() list available themes. sketch TRUE, use hand-drawn style rendered diagram. pad Diagram padding pixels. Numeric value string coercible whole number. animate_interval Required fileext "gif" output uses "gif" file extension. font_family String font family name. Passed systemfonts::match_font() set regular, bold, italic fonts. Fonts must TTF file. D2 flag setting semi-bold fonts supported time. font_family can also supplied named vector font family names elements named regular, italic, bold use different font family names different styles fonts. font_family can also vector TTF file paths allow users provide distinct fonts regular, italic, bold text. overwrite FALSE output exists, abort rendering. Defaults TRUE. preview TRUE, preview rendered plot using d2_ggplot(). Reqires magick package. auto_pdf Whether use PDF images automatically output format LaTeX. TRUE, e.g. foo/bar.png replaced foo/bar.pdf latter exists. can useful since normally PDF images higher quality raster images like PNG, output LaTeX/PDF. dpi DPI (dots per inch) value. Used calculate output width (inches) images. actual width pixels, divided dpi. provided, chunk option dpi used; NA, output width calculated. rel_path Whether automatically convert absolute paths relative paths. know sure absolute paths work, may set argument global option knitr.graphics.rel_path FALSE. error Whether signal error files specified path argument exist web resources.

what: Create a D2 SQL Table Diagram — d2_sql_table
title: Create a D2 SQL Table Diagram — d2_sql_table
text: Create D2 SQL Table Diagram

title: Create a D2 SQL Table Diagram — d2_sql_table
code: d2_sql_table(   data = NULL,   visibility = NULL,   col_types = vec_ptype_abbr,   id = NULL,   label = id,   ... )

title: Create a D2 SQL Table Diagram — d2_sql_table
text: data data frame used column names types. Ignored col_types named vector. Required col_types unnamed function. visibility One : , +, -, #. Length recycled match number columns data. col_types named character vector, unnamed character vector length number columns data, function returns character vector based columns data. Defaults vctrs::vec_ptype_abbr. recommended options vctrs::vec_ptype_full base::typeof. types named character vector, column names data ignored names types used instead. id Diagram container id passed d2_container(). Defaults NULL. NULL, id set rlang::caller_arg(data) data supplied random string data = NULL. label Diagram label. Defaults id. supplied, label displayed instead id. ... Arguments passed d2_container lines Optional diagram text. supplied lines recycled match length id. class Diagram class name Diagram container name width,height Diagram width height (pixels?) style string results d2_style() helper function. icon Diagram icon collapse collapse = "\n", return string D2 diagram code container. collapse = NULL (default), return character vector length id.

title: Create a D2 SQL Table Diagram — d2_sql_table
text: character string D2 diagram code using "sql_type" shape.

title: Create a D2 SQL Table Diagram — d2_sql_table
Create a D2 style — d2_style
text: Learn : https://d2lang.com/tour/style

title: Create a D2 style — d2_style
code: d2_style(   ...,   inline = FALSE,   level = c("shape", "connector", "root"),   after = "\n" )

title: Create a D2 style — d2_style
text: ... Named attributes style. Underscores parameter names substituted dashes match D2 style, e.g. "stroke_dash" converted "stroke-dash". inline TRUE string value , return string instead array. Errors either case single parameter supplied. string, string assumed id shape, connector, container/map appended "style" keyword. level String. "shape", "connector", "root". "root", limit style supported attributes root-level style. See https://d2lang.com/tour/style#root information. String line style specification. Defaults "\n"

title: Create a D2 style — d2_style
